Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: hexo-matery(gitlab)
Post._content: ``` ``` ## hexo node.jsGit ```shell node -vnpm -v npm install hexo-cli -g hexo init blog cd blog npm install hexo server ``` ## hexo-theme-matery ```bash git clone https://codeload.github.com/blinkfox/hexo-theme-matery/zip/master ``` hexotheme ## _config.yml hexo_config.yml themehexo-theme-matery urlurl per_page6 languagezh-CN ## ### categories #### ```shell hexo new page "categories" ``` #### ```yaml --- title: categories date: 2018-09-30 17:25:30 type: "categories" layout: "categories" --- ``` ### tags #### ```shell hexo new page "tages" ``` #### ```yaml --- title: tags date: 2018-09-30 18:23:38 type: "tags" layout: "tags" --- ``` ### about #### ```shell hexo new page "about" ``` #### ```yaml --- title: about date: 2018-09-30 17:25:30 type: "about" layout: "about" --- ``` ### friends #### ```shell hexo new page "friends" ``` #### ```yaml --- title: friends date: 2018-12-12 21:25:30 type: "friends" layout: "friends" --- ``` json source_data _datafriends.json ```json [{ "avatar": "http://image.luokangyuan.com/1_qq_27922023.jpg", "name": "", "introduction": "", "url": "http://luokangyuan.com/", "title": "" }, { "avatar": "http://image.luokangyuan.com/4027734.jpeg", "name": "", "introduction": "", "url": "https://blinkfox.github.io/", "title": "" }, { "avatar": "http://image.luokangyuan.com/avatar.jpg", "name": "ja_rome", "introduction": "", "url": "ttps://me.csdn.net/jlh912008548", "title": "" }] ``` ### Hexo [hexo-prism-plugin](https://github.com/ele828/hexo-prism-plugin) Hexo ```bash npm i -S hexo-prism-plugin ``` Hexo `_config.yml` `highlight.enable` `false` `prism` ```yaml highlight: enable: false prism_plugin: mode: 'preprocess' # realtime/preprocess theme: 'tomorrow' line_number: false # default false custom_css: ``` ### [hexo-generator-search](https://github.com/wzpan/hexo-generator-search) Hexo ```shell npm install hexo-generator-search --save ``` Hexo `_config.yml` ```yaml search: path: search.xml field: post ``` ### Hexo `SEO` `gitment` [hexo-permalink-pinyin](https://github.com/viko16/hexo-permalink-pinyin) Hexo ```bash npm i hexo-permalink-pinyin --save ``` Hexo `_config.yml` ```yaml permalink_pinyin: enable: true separator: '-' # default: '-' ``` ### [hexo-wordcount](https://github.com/willin/hexo-wordcount) ```bash npm i --save hexo-wordcount ``` `_config.yml` ```yaml wordCount: enable: false # true . postWordCount: true min2read: true totalCount: true ``` ### RSS [hexo-generator-feed](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo-generator-feed) Hexo `RSS` ```bash npm install hexo-generator-feed --save ``` Hexo `_config.yml` ```yaml feed: type: atom path: atom.xml limit: 20 hub: content: content_limit: 140 content_limit_delim: ' ' order_by: -date ``` `hexo clean && hexo g` `public` `atom.xml` ### `/layout/_partial/footer.ejs` ### `_config.yml` `QQ``GitHub` `/layout/_partial/social-link.ejs` ```html ``` `fa-github` [Font Awesome](https://fontawesome.com/icons) - Facebook: `fa-facebook` - Twitter: `fa-twitter` - Google-plus: `fa-google-plus` - Linkedin: `fa-linkedin` - Tumblr: `fa-tumblr` - Medium: `fa-medium` - Slack: `fa-slack` - : `fa-weibo` - : `fa-wechat` - QQ: `fa-qq` > ****: `Font Awesome` `4.7.0` ### `source/medias/reward` ### `source` `_data` `musics.json` ```json [{ "name": "", "artist": "AnimeVibe", "url": "http://xxx.com/music1.mp3", "cover": "http://xxx.com/music-cover1.png" }, { "name": "Take me hand", "artist": "DAISHI DANCE,Cecile Corbel", "url": "/medias/music/music2.mp3", "cover": "/medias/music/cover2.png" }, { "name": "Shape of You", "artist": "J.Fla", "url": "http://xxx.com/music3.mp3", "cover": "http://xxx.com/music-cover3.png" }] ``` > **** JSON `name``artist``url``cover` `_config.yml` ```yaml # . music: enable: true showTitle: false title: fixed: false # autoplay: false # theme: '#42b983' loop: 'all' # , : 'all', 'one', 'none' order: 'list' # , : 'list', 'random' preload: 'auto' # : 'none', 'metadata', 'auto' volume: 0.7 # listFolded: false # listMaxHeight: # ``` ## Front-matter ### Front-matter `Front-matter` **** `title` `date` | | | | | :--------- | :----------------------------- | :----------------------------------------------------------- | | title | `Markdown` | | | date | | | | author | `_config.yml` `author` | | | img | `featureImages` | ().: `http://xxx.com/xxx.jpg` | | top | `true` | `top` `true` | | cover | `false` | `v1.0.2` | | coverImg | | `v1.0.2` | | password | | `password` `SHA256` `config.yml` `verifyPassword` | | toc | `true` | TOC TOC `config.yml` `toc` | | mathjax | `false` | `mathjax` `_config.yml` | | summary | | | | categories | | | | tags | | | > ****: > > 1. `img` `hashcode` **** > 2. `date` `Gitalk` `Gitment` `id` `date` > 3. Front-matter SHA256 password `_config.yml` SHA256 [](http://tool.oschina.net/encrypt?type=2)[chahuo](http://encode.chahuo.com/)[](http://tool.chinaz.com/tools/hash.aspx) `Front-matter` ### ```yaml --- title: typora-vue-theme date: 2018-09-07 09:25:00 --- ``` ### ```yaml --- title: typora-vue-theme date: 2018-09-07 09:25:00 author: img: /source/images/xxx.jpg top: true cover: true coverImg: /images/1.jpg password: 8d969eef6ecad3c29a3a629280e686cf0c3f5d5a86aff3ca12020c923adc6c92 toc: false mathjax: false summary: categories: Markdown tags: - Typora - Markdown --- ``` ## ![](https://statics.sh1a.qingstor.com/2018/12/02/matery-20181202-1.png) **** ![](https://statics.sh1a.qingstor.com/2018/12/02/matery-20181202-2.png) **** ![](https://statics.sh1a.qingstor.com/2018/12/02/matery-20181202-3.png) **** ![](https://statics.sh1a.qingstor.com/2018/12/02/matery-20181202-7.png) **** ![](https://statics.sh1a.qingstor.com/2018/12/02/matery-20181202-8.png) **** ## `_config.yml` - - - - - `favicon` `Logo` - - TOC - - - MathJax - - - - - - `Gitalk``Gitment``Valine` `disqus` - [](http://busuanzi.ibruce.info/)`Google Analytics` - `hashcode` **** `_config.yml` ### `/source/css/matery.css` `.bg-color` ```css /* . */ .bg-color { background-image: linear-gradient(to right, #4cbf30 0%, #0f9d58 100%); } @-webkit-keyframes rainbow { /* . */ } @keyframes rainbow { /* . */ } ``` ### banner `/source/medias/banner` `banner` `7` `JavaScript` `banner` `/layout/_partial/bg-cover-content.ejs` `` ```javascript $('.bg-cover').css('background-image', 'url(/medias/banner/' + new Date().getDay() + '.jpg)'); ``` `/source/medias/featureimages` 24 `_config.yml`
